metadata.Title: CVE-2019-5420 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A remote code execution vulnerability in development mode Rails <5.2.2.1,<6.0.0.beta3 can allow an attacker to guess the automatically generateddevelopment mode secret token. This secret token can be used in combinationwith other Rails internals to escalate to a remote code execution exploit.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-actionpack-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
